assets.description: if true it stores assets of the manual job

browserDisplay.description: sanitized browser name displayed in the UI (e.g. "Google Chrome")

device.description: device name if manual testing is on mobile

tunnel.description: tunnel id to run manual test on (if available)

subaccounts.description: Include subaccounts in list of jobs

users.description: list of usernames in the organization
